reinforcement:
⚠️ COZY RETREAT — KEY RULES FOR IMAGE GENERATION:
- CRITICAL: The Bed must be centered on the wall OPPOSITE the door — it's the first thing you see entering.
- Center the Bed with one nightstand on each side (left AND right).
- CRITICAL: The Sofa MUST be at the FOOT of the bed (the end away from the headboard), facing the bed. Bed + sofa form ONE unified lounging block.
- Tuck the Table/Desk into a far corner, out of the main sightline from the door.
- Sofa faces INWARD toward the bed, NOT toward a wall.
- The output MUST look visibly DIFFERENT from the input image.

  - kitchen counter (kitchen_counter_1): fixed at top (north)-left (west). NO furniture here.
  - shower (shower_1): fixed at top (north)-right (east). NO furniture here.
full_prompt:
TASK: Edit this 2D top-down floor plan to show the "Cozy Retreat" arrangement.

╔══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║  ⚠️  STRICT RULES                                            ║
╠══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╣
║  1. Exactly 13 movable items must appear.           ║
║  2. REQUIRED: [table, chair, chair, sofa, artwork, bed, nightstand, nightstand, plant, lamp, artwork, rug, rug]                             ║
║  3. DO NOT ADD or REMOVE any furniture.                      ║
║  4. DOOR (north (top) at ~46%): 2+ feet clear.               ║
║  5. DO NOT MOVE: [refrigerator, cabinet, kitchen counter, sink, stovetop, door, sink, sink, toilet, shower, shelf, window, window, window]                             ║
║  6. OUTPUT = 2D TOP-DOWN VIEW (not 3D).                      ║
╚══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

⚠️ DO NOT DUPLICATE FURNITURE:
- This room has exactly: 1 table, 2 chairs, 1 sofa, 2 artworks, 1 bed, 2 nightstands, 1 plant, 1 lamp, 2 rugs.
- MOVE = ERASE from old spot + PLACE in new spot. Do NOT copy.
- If the same item appears in TWO places, the output is INVALID.
- COUNT each furniture type before finishing. Counts must match input.

⚠️ EXCLUSION ZONES — furniture MUST NOT overlap these fixed fixtures:
  - refrigerator (refrigerator_1): fixed at top (north)-left (west). NO furniture here.
  - kitchen counter (kitchen_counter_1): fixed at top (north)-left (west). NO furniture here.
  - shower (shower_1): fixed at top (north)-right (east). NO furniture here.

STYLE: Cozy Retreat
This layout establishes a central, unified 'Cozy Retreat' by placing the sofa directly at the foot of the bed, forming a large, comfortable lounging island. The work/dining area is neatly tucked to the side by the kitchenette, keeping the relaxation space distinct and maximizing the feeling of comfort upon entry.

FURNITURE PLACEMENT — FOLLOW EXACTLY:
  • BED_1: Centered against the south wall, between the two low windows, directly opposite the main entrance.
  • NIGHTSTAND_1: Positioned to the left of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
  • NIGHTSTAND_2: Positioned to the right of the bed's headboard, against the south wall.
  • SOFA_1: Placed at the foot of bed_1, facing the bed's headboard to create a single, unified lounging block in the center of the room.
  • TABLE_1: Set against the west wall, in the space between the kitchen area and the main lounging block.
  • CHAIR_1: Tucked under the east side of table_1, facing the west wall.
  • CHAIR_2: Tucked under the south side of table_1, facing north.
  • ARTWORK_1: Mounted on the south wall, centered above the headboard of bed_1.
  • ARTWORK_2: Mounted on the west wall, centered above table_1 to define the dining nook.
  • PLANT_1: Placed in the southeast corner of the room, next to nightstand_2.
  • LAMP_1: Positioned in the southwest corner of the room, providing ambient light to the sofa and bed area.
  • RUG_1: Placed on the floor on the left side of the bed, partially under nightstand_1.
  • RUG_2: Placed on the floor on the right side of the bed, partially under nightstand_2.

ZONES:
  • work_zone: Located along the west wall, adjacent to the kitchenette, creating a distinct area for dining or work.
  • sleep_zone: Anchored on the south wall, opposite the entrance, making the bed the central feature of the room.
  • living_zone: Integrated with the sleep zone in the center and southern portion of the room, with the sofa facing the bed to form a cohesive relaxation area.

⚠️ COZY RETREAT — KEY RULES FOR IMAGE GENERATION:
- CRITICAL: The Bed must be centered on the wall OPPOSITE the door — it's the first thing you see entering.
- Center the Bed with one nightstand on each side (left AND right).
- CRITICAL: The Sofa MUST be at the FOOT of the bed (the end away from the headboard), facing the bed. Bed + sofa form ONE unified lounging block.
- Tuck the Table/Desk into a far corner, out of the main sightline from the door.
- Sofa faces INWARD toward the bed, NOT toward a wall.
- The output MUST look visibly DIFFERENT from the input image.

DOOR CLEARANCE: The main furniture is consolidated in the southern half of the room, leaving a clear, wide pathway from the entrance door (door_1) to the main living area and the bathroom.

STRUCTURAL (fixed): Door=north (top) at ~46%, Window=interior at ~50%, Others=[refrigerator, cabinet, kitchen counter, sink, stovetop, door, sink, sink, toilet, shower, shelf, window, window, window]

OUTPUT: Same 2D style as input, all 13 items in their NEW positions, professional floor plan.
Do NOT place furniture on top of kitchen appliances, bathroom fixtures, or any structural element.
Edit the floor plan to show "Cozy Retreat".
